ManageServerLogGroup: The SecurityGroup to access the services in the cluster.
Number of the Swarm manager instances to launch.
S3 bucket name for the Quick Start assets. Quick Start bucket name can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).
Cluster name must start with a letter and can only contain letters, numbers, or hyphens.
List of Availability Zones to use for the subnets in the VPC. Note: The logical order is preserved.
The FireCamp System Services release version
Number of the Swarm worker instances to launch.
The internal SecurityGroup for the cluster nodes to access each other.
Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances.
ID of the instance IAM Profile
The Linux distribution for the AMI to be used for the service instances
The FireCamp Catalog Service release version
Subnet-ID the existing subnet in your VPC where you want to deploy node(s).
Quick Start bucket name can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).
